events.message: I received the wrong size and would like to request a refund for my order as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund after reviewing the customer's request regarding a wrong size item.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and I attached a photo showing the wrong size label on the product.
We have reviewed your request and will issue a full refund once we receive the product back. A prepaid return label will be emailed to you shortly.
Thank you for your prompt response and the return label. I appreciate the quick assistance in resolving this.
Your refund has been processed successfully after receiving the returned item. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As there are no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
